Nature Walks

Magnifcent plants of Genting Highlands; Supermodels of the fashion forest

We offer 2 types of guided nature walks for guests

  1. Magnificent plants of Genting Highlands
  2. Supermodels of the fashion forest

1
Magnificent plants of Genting Highlands

Pricing

RM 75/adult (12 years & above)

RM 65/child (11 years & below)

Transport is provided

Drinking water is provided

Walking sticks are provided

Guests brings own camera and camera phones for photography

Minimum size of group: 4pax

2
Supermodels of the fashion forest

Pricing

RM 75/adult (12 years & above)

RM 65/child (11 years & below)

Transport is provided

Drinking water is provided

Walking sticks are provided

Guests brings own camera and camera phones for photography

Minimum size of group: 4pax
